divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my 3rd floor balcony and out of the corner of my eye i saw a light. i thought it was a plane, since we live along a popular flight path but when i looked up it went so fast i knew it wasn't a plane. it was almost like a large blue\green fireball and it fell from the sky at a very fast rate, almost like a meteor but there was no tail\trail. it fell behind the tree line and i couldn't see it any more. after that i scanned the sky near by for any sign of anything unusual. i saw what looked like a regular star in the sky. a few moments later i looked back in that direction and the start was no longer there. it is a cloudless night.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There were no other sightings in Clearwater on or around October 6th 2011
